name: pomeranian-durations
description: An immutable duration library based on the ISO-8601 format for durations.

scripts.rebuild-docs-index: node src/_generate_docs.js > README.md && node src/_generate_index.js > src/index.js && git commit -m 'Regenerate docs and index' README.md src/index.js || true
scripts.build: npm run rebuild-docs-index && babel src/ --out-dir lib/ --ignore *.spec.js
scripts.preversion: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run build

author: Webpapaya
